article:
I work as a taxi driver for nearly ten years. It's a _ job most of time. I like to meet different people. I always work during the day , because there are too _ cars during the day. I live 20 kilometers outside of London and I go to _ at 5:30 in the afternoon. I usually go home between two and three o'clock in the morning.
There is a very strange and interesting thing one night. I take a woman with a little dog _ home. When we get to her house, She can't find her key and purse  . So I wait in the car with the dog and she climbs in through the window.
I wait for half an hour. At last I want to know what is wrong with her. I tie   the dog to a tree and _ in through the window, too.
A policeman passes by and he thinks I am a thief . I argue  with the policeman. The _ .akes the dog barking loudly. The old woman wakes up and goes out of the house Because just now she goes to _ and forgets me and the dog at all!
